name: markdown-links
description: Adds command - Show Graph - that displays a graph of local links between markdown files in the current working directory.

markdown-links.showColumn.description:
- active – in the currently focused column.
- beside – (default) other than the current.
- one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine – respective editor columns.

markdown-links.openColumn.description:
- active – in the currently focused column.
- beside – other than the current.
- one (default), two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine – respective editor columns.

markdown-links.fileIdRegexp.description: Regular extension used to find file IDs. First match of this regex in file contents, excluding [[links]], will be used as the file ID. This file ID can be used for wiki-style links.

markdown-links.autoStart.description: Should Markdown Links automatically start when a markdown file is opened.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
